web-app:
StatisticView is a Web application made to display: * a table with the main statistics stored in the local IntAct Database: - number of proteins - number of interactions - number of interactions with 2 interactors - number of interactions with more than 2 interactors - number of experiments - number of terms provided by the controlled vocabulary * 4 graphics to show the evolution of these amount of data in the database
uk.ac.ebi.intact.AC_PREFIX EBI
The Accession Number Prefix for the objects created by the application and stored in the database.
uk.ac.ebi.intact.INSTITUTION_LABEL ebi
The label of the institution, used to retrieve the Institution object if it already exists, or to create a new institution
uk.ac.ebi.intact.PRELOAD_COMMON_CVOBJECTS false
Preload the most common CvObjects on application start, so it is faster to retrieve them later
logfile intact_log.txt

uk.ac.ebi.intact.filter.EXCLUDED_EXTENSIONS *.jpg,*.gif,*.png
List of extensions. If the request URL ends with one of the params provided, it won't be filtered by the IntactSessionRequestFilter and no IntactContext will be created for those requests.
